hero.headline: Coaching that makes board exams feel possible, not painful.
hero.description: Classes 8 to 12 with a clear plan: concept builders, weekly tests, mentor support, and practical exam strategy for CBSE and State boards.

about.title: Where scientific rigor meets mentorship.
about.body: Masters Academy of Science is a coaching institute for classes 8 to 12, supporting both State and CBSE boards. We focus on strong fundamentals, board exam preparation, and steady academic progress.

cards.title: Mission
cards.body: Build confident students with clear concepts, exam practice, and consistent mentoring.

cards.title: Vision
cards.body: A trusted institute for board excellence and lifelong learning habits.

cards.title: Culture
cards.body: We balance discipline with curiosity and give every student attention.

feature.title: Faculty focused on school success.
feature.body: Our teachers design board-focused notes, chapter tests, and revision plans that keep students ahead of the syllabus.

items.title: Class 7-8 Foundation
items.detail: Concept building, weekly worksheets, and smart revision for Science and Maths.

items.title: Class 9-10 Board Prep
items.detail: State and CBSE board-focused notes, model papers, and chapter-wise tests.

items.title: Class 11-12 PCM Track
items.detail: Physics, Chemistry, Maths with deep problem solving and exam practice.

items.title: Class 11-12 PCB Track
items.detail: Physics, Chemistry, Biology with concept clarity and board scoring tips.

items.title: Doubt Solving Clinics
items.detail: Daily doubt hours, one-on-one mentoring, and homework support.

items.title: Revision Bootcamps
items.detail: High-yield recap sessions before exams with timed practice.

labs.title: Interactive classrooms and practical demos.
labs.body: Every batch learns through smart boards, practical demonstrations, and real-life examples. We blend concepts with application-based questions.

card.title: Board Exam Strategy
card.body: Structured lesson plans, concept maps, and board-style practice to help students score higher with confidence.

items.name: Ajay Wakdikar
items.detail: Known for concept clarity and board-focused problem solving.

items.name: Neha Kulkarni
items.detail: Organic and physical chemistry simplified with daily practice.

items.name: Suresh Patil
items.detail: Step-by-step methods for algebra, geometry, and calculus.

items.name: Priya Deshmukh
items.detail: NCERT-focused explanations with smart diagrams and mnemonics.

testimonials.title: Parents and students love the results.

items.name: Ayesha Rahman
items.quote: The weekly tests and notes made board preparation easy. My Science score jumped from 68 to 92.

items.name: Lucas Bennett
items.quote: Regular updates and doubt sessions helped my child stay consistent and confident.

items.name: Priya Nair
items.quote: The teachers explained difficult chapters clearly and the revision bootcamps were super helpful.

cta.title: Ready to boost your board results?
cta.body: Speak with our team to find the right batch for your class and board.

programsPage.title: Choose the right class and board track.
programsPage.body: State and CBSE aligned syllabi with concept clarity, worksheets, and regular mock exams.
programsPage.trackDetail: Weekly tests - Notes + worksheets - Doubt sessions.

feature.title: Batch timings that fit school schedules.
feature.body: Morning, evening, and weekend batches available for classes 8 to 12.

admissionsPage.title: Simple admission for classes 8 to 12.
admissionsPage.body: We understand your current level and place you in the right batch for steady progress and board success.
steps: Submit an enquiry with class and board details.
Receive a personalized study plan and batch recommendation.
Complete admission with fee guidance and start date.

feature.title: Scholarships and flexible fee plans.
feature.body: Merit-based scholarships and installment options are available for eligible students.

contactPage.title: Let's plan your academic goals.
contactPage.body: Reach out to schedule a demo class, ask about board-specific batches, or request the full brochure.

feature.title: Visit the campus for a demo class.
feature.body: 85 Discovery Ave, Science Park, Innovation District. Open Monday to Saturday from 8:00 AM to 7:00 PM.

footer.headline: Masters Academy of Science
footer.body: Training future innovators through research-driven learning, hands-on labs, and industry mentorship.
